name: Darkwave
description:
Darkwave, is an interactive experience built around the song "Darkwave".  It's less of a game and more of a visual accompaniment for the song, with no interaction from the player necessary.

This game was created for a university project, by the following people:

"Darkwave" soundtrack by: Jack McBryde, David Kormany, Peter Jackson, Dylan Crause and Brooke Wakeham-Hastie.

Design by: Daniel Buckley, Shaun Graham, Nam Ha, Alissa Juett, Stephanie Nixon, Crystal Nugent and Troy Rodgerson.

Programming by: Daniel Buckley.

Models by: Daniel Buckley and Shaun Graham.

EPILEPSY WARNING: GAME CONTAINS FAST, FLASHING LIGHTS!
